name: BackRooms's 1995 The Lost Footage: Chapter 1
storyline:
Backroom's 1995 The Lost Footage Chapter 1

My name is Jacob i am 25 years old I heard there was a lot of rumor's that if find this abandoned house you start to see things but i am here to Find my brother, He went missing sometime in January of 1970 Missing posters my brother was one of them. but the police tried to locate him, but they couldn't find any track of my brother so i took my chances to look for my brother by myself the only message my brother told me was FIND ME and a picture of an old, abandoned house. You start to look around turn on the power to the house after that you think its sign from you brother because of the tv turn on and there was a VHS tape on table so you put it and play it that's where you find yourself IN DARK PLACE

But there is catch... Watch your back as the unseen entities may be lurking. Turning your journey into a chilling nightmare. There is a scientist calls you out of nowhere and he wants you dead badly...
summary: My name is Jacob i am 25 years old I heard there was a lot of rumor's that if find this abandoned house you start to see things but i am here to Find my brother, He went missing sometime in January of 1970 Missing posters my brother was one of them.
